As the image above suggests, this is going to be iterative. Try changing a few things and reknitting a single page or rebuilding the whole site. Do your own thing, or here are a few things to try: 

<br> 

## Change the website's theme

Try changing the website's theme in your `_site.yml`. Explore options here: <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/html_document_format.html#appearance_and_style>:

>Valid themes include "default", "cerulean", "journal", "flatly", "readable", "spacelab",  "united", "cosmo", "lumen", "paper", "sandstone", "simplex", and "yeti".
